name: Software Engineer (Data Services)
description:
We are looking for candidates who can demonstrate technology agility, good coding, algorithms and protocols development skills.

Required skills:

  • Strong knowledge of OOP, basic data structures and algorithms.
  • Experience of software development using Java
  • Experience of datalake development in Cloud platforms (GCP, AWS)
  • Experience with Hadoop (Spark, Flink, Kafka, Hive).
  • Experience with any DB
  • English – Upper-Intermediate (speaking)

Responsibilities:

  • Development and elaboration of datalake.
  • Design, development and support of the software in the SaaS model (software as service).

Benefits:

  • Employment according to the Labour Code of Russian Federation
  • Additional medical insurance
  • Advanced social benefits package
  • Free parking place
  • Free Company's shares
  • Professional trainings
  • Business trips to USA
  • Opportunity to develop professional skills and working in the strong team!
